Political Science Notes Duong Pham 2022-03-14 Chapter 1 About this booklet 1.1 About the author This booklet is created by Duong Pham, a Ph.D. student in Political Science at University of California, San Diego. My personal website Follow me on Twitter 1.2 About the booklet In this booklet, you will find: - Reading lists, annotated bibliographies, as well as essays for a wide array of topics spanning the two political science sub-fields: (1) International Relations and (2) Comparative Politics. - My notes for matters related to research methodologies, including recommended self-study resources (online courses, videos, webpages, etc.), personal notes for methods classes’ lectures, recommended tools, etc.
